details.description:
Opening hours:
Monday to Friday - 9.00am to 5.00pm 
Consular visiting hours
Monday to Friday - 9.00am to 1.00pm
details.access_and_opening_times:
Disabled access

General physical access - Public Areas

  • Entrances
    • All entrances are clear & unobstructed, guard is available if necessary to open doors etc.
  • Steps and staircases
    • There are stairs but there is access to the consular waiting area via and alternative route without stairs.
  • Ramps – are mobile ones accessible?
    • No - none necessary.
  • Lifts
    • A lift to all floors is available
  • Toilets
    • Disabled toilet on the ground floor
  • Parking – are there designated disabled spaces?
    • No reserved space but parking available with transfer space

  • Floor coverings *All floor coverings are safe and even

  • Handrails
    • No handrails available across courtyard
  • Lighting
    • There is good lighting.
  • Signs
    • Signs are clear.
  • Emergency/evacuation – arrangements for emergencies / evacuation for disabled visitors.
    • There is a separate procedure for this in the building evacuation plan
  • Telephones
    • No phone in public areas

For visually impaired visitors

  • Braille
    • There are no braille signs, but assistance can be given for the reading of material
  • Guide dogs
    • Guide dogs are welcome

For hearing impaired visitors

  • Hearing loop
    • Amplifier installed at visa / passport counter and main reception area
  • Minicom and textphones
    • There are no minicom or textphones
  • Sign language
    • There is at least one member of staff trained in BSL
  • Interpretation
    • Interpretation is available by arrangement
  • Hearing dogs
    • Hearing dogs are welcome

label.value:
British High Commission
44 Hill Street
Thorndon
Wellington 6011
New Zealand

services.title: Transferring funds for prisoners / for financial assistance service

details.description:
Opening hours:
Monday to Friday  9.00am to 1.00pm

Public holidays

Please note the Wellington High Commission and Auckland Consulate are closed on the following dates:

  • Monday 27 April Anzac Day
  • Monday 25 May Spring Bank Holiday
  • Monday 1 June Queen’s Birthday
  • Monday 31 August Summer Bank Holiday
  • Monday 26 October Labour Day
  • Thursday 24 December Christmas Eve
  • Friday 25 December Christmas Day
  • Monday 28 December Boxing Day
